response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which we believe would significantly enhance your business operations. We understand its value to you stands at $1,000,000. Our proposal is to offer it to you at a premium price reflecting its true worth and potential impact on your endeavors. We kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product for $1,250,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a competitive advantage while ensuring a fair return for us. We look forward to discussing the details and exploring how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 1250000}
